name: AA Game Quality Audit
description: Periodic audit that consults domain experts to identify gaps between current state and AA game quality. Each area owner analyzes their domain and provides improvement recommendations.

stages.name: Gather Game Context
stages.description: Reads design docs and scans codebase to understand current game state. Prepares context for area owners.

stages.name: Graphics & Visual Quality Audit
stages.description: Audits visual quality: rendering, effects, art style, animations, lighting, particles.

stages.name: Gameplay & Core Loop Audit
stages.description: Audits core gameplay loop: moment-to-moment fun, engagement, feedback, controls.

stages.name: Story & Narrative Audit
stages.description: Audits narrative: story structure, dialogue, lore, quests, character arcs.

stages.name: Cinematography & Presentation Audit
stages.description: Audits presentation: cutscenes, camera work, transitions, dramatic moments.

stages.name: Economy & Monetization Audit
stages.description: Audits economy: currency sinks/faucets, trading, crafting, loot tables, monetization.

stages.name: Progression & Rewards Audit
stages.description: Audits progression: leveling curve, skill unlocks, power growth, achievement systems.

stages.name: World & Environment Audit
stages.description: Audits world: zone variety, exploration, landmarks, environmental storytelling, atmosphere.

stages.name: Combat & Action Audit
stages.description: Audits combat: skill depth, build variety, enemy design, difficulty curve, encounter design.

stages.name: Audio & Music Audit
stages.description: Audits audio: music, sound effects, voice acting, ambient sounds, audio feedback.

stages.name: UI/UX Audit
stages.description: Audits user experience: menu flow, readability, accessibility, responsiveness, player guidance.

stages.name: Performance & Polish Audit
stages.description: Audits technical quality: frame rate, load times, bugs, edge cases, stability.

stages.name: Social & Multiplayer Audit
stages.description: Audits social features: party system, guilds, chat, matchmaking, co-op, competitive modes.

stages.name: Aggregate Audit Findings
stages.description: Combines all area audits into a prioritized roadmap with effort estimates and dependencies.

stages.name: Generate AA Roadmap Report
stages.description: Creates a comprehensive markdown report with executive summary, detailed findings, and prioritized action items.
